effect_entries.effect: Reveals trainers who want a rematch, by showing !! over their heads.  Each use drains the battery; requires 100 steps to charge.
effect_entries.short_effect: Allows rebattling of on-screen trainers. 100 steps to recharge.

flavor_text_entries.text:
戦いたい　トレーナーを
教えてくれる　機械。
歩くと　電池が　たまる。

A device that indicates Trainers who
want to battle. Its battery charges
while you walk.

Apparecchio per trovare gli Allenatori che
vogliono lottare. La batteria si ricarica
camminando.

Uno de los tres cupones que sirve para obtener
un Poké-reloj.

Ein Gerät, das rückkampfwillige Trainer ausfindig
macht. Die Batterie lädt sich beim Reisen auf.

Un appareil indiquant les Dresseurs prêts à
se battre. La batterie se recharge quand vous
marchez.

싸우고 싶어하는 트레이너를
알려주는 기계.
걸으면 전지가 충전된다.

たたかいたい　トレーナーを
おしえてくれる　きかい。
あるくと　でんちが　たまる。

A device that indicates Trainers who
want to battle. Its battery charges
while you walk.

A device that indicates Trainers who

A device that indicates TRAINERS
who want to battle. The battery
charges while traveling.

A rechargeable unit
that flags battle-
ready TRAINERS.
